name: debug
comment: Enables / Disables the Small Things debug mode (DEFAULT: false)

name: discordRPC
comment: Enables / Disables Discord Rich Presence (DEFAULT: true)

name: extraSongs
comment: Enables / Disables extra songs such as Ridge (DEFAULT: true)

name: inputMode
comment: Sets a specific input mode (0: WASD || 1: DFJK [DEFAULT: 0])

name: lyrics
comment: Enables / Disables on-screen lyrics for applicable songs (DEFAULT: true)

name: songIndicator
comment: Enables / Disables the song indicator at the top right of the screen when starting a song (DEFAULT: true)

name: unknownIcons
comment: Enables / Disables the unknown antagonist icons (DEFAULT: true)
